metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1075 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux Kernel. The tls_is_tx_ready() incorrectlychecks for list emptiness, potentially accessing a type confused entry tothe list_head, leaking the last byte of the confused field that overlapswith rec->tx_ready.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
